summary.title: Bedrohungsmodell - OTT Auth
summary.description: Die Firma Allsecure betreibt unterschiedliche Anwendungen mit Hilfe einer 2-Faktorauthentifizierung via One-time token, der an das entsprechende Smartphone des Nutzers geschickt wird.

data.name:
Login System -
Webapp +
Mobile App
data.description: Vergleicht eingegebenen OTT-Wert auf Telefon mit erwartetem OTT seitens 2-Faktor-Dienst.

threats.title: DDoS
threats.description:
Ein DDoS Angriff kann den Login-Dienst überlasten und somit für Anwender unerreichbar machen. 

CAPEC-125: Flooding: An adversary consumes the resources of a target by rapidly engaging in a large number of interactions with the target.

ATT&CK: TA0038 - Network Effects: The adversary is trying to intercept or manipulate network traffic to or from a device.

D: 8 / R: 10 / E: 8 / A: 10 / DREA: 36
threats.mitigation:
Firewall, Load-Balancer oder CDN einsetzen, um direkten Datenverkehr auf Login-Server zu begrenzen.

DEFEND: D3-ITF - Inbound Traffic Filtering
ASVS: CWE 770 (8.1.4): Verify the application can detect and alert on abnormal numbers of requests, such as by IP, user, total per hour or day, or whatever makes sense for the application.

D: 4 / R: 10 / E: 4 / A: 10 / Neuer DREA: 28

threats.title: Spoofing by Key theft
threats.description:
An attacker obtains an authoritative or reputable signer's private signature key in order to login.
CAPEC-474

Attack ID: T1552 Unsecured Credentials
DREA: 5,25
threats.mitigation:
The login page could ask for additional verification steps. Probably not more secure than private key. With a zero trust policy one can make sure that even if an attacker is capable of legitimately logging on as someone else only that user is affected.
DREA: 5,25

threats.title: An attacker could gain access to Admin Panel
threats.description:
Attacker gains access to admin-interface

T1068
Capec: 233
DREA 7,6
threats.mitigation:
D3-APA Access Policy Administration
Secure the access for admins -> only with secure devices, IP-filtering, geo-fencing
Zero trust policy
DREA:3,75

threats.title: Denial of service through flooding
threats.description:
An attacker floods the auth service with new auth requests which lead to overload and dos for auth server.

Attack: T1621 Multi-Factor Authentication Request Generation 
CAPEC-488
Drea: 8
threats.mitigation:
Rate limit api auth access / block if excessive -> through captcha bot detection
raise alert
D3-ANET Authentication Event Thresholding
DREA:4

threats.title: Attacker repudiates to malicious API calls
threats.description:
Attacker repudiates to malicious API calls

Attacker denies to have obtained access to API. 
CAPEC-545
DREA:2
threats.mitigation:
Log API-calls accordingly -> secure them 
ASVS 16.2.1 Verify that each log entry includes necessary metadata 
DREA:1

threats.title: Spoofing von Kundendaten
threats.description:
Angreifer kann sich als "legitimer" Kunde ausgeben, um an kritische Daten / Dienste zu gelangen zu denen er eigentlich keinen Zugriff haben dürfte (Social Engineering beim Kundendienst).

CAPEC ID: 148: Content Spoofing: An adversary modifies content to make it contain something other than what the original content producer intended while keeping the apparent source of the content unchanged.
Att&ck: T1557 (Adversary-in-the-Middle)

D: 9 / R: 8 / E: 5 / A: 4 / DREA: 26
threats.mitigation:
Personal schulen, Kritische Kundendaten als solche für Mitarbeiter in der Support-Software markieren, um Irrtümer zu vermeiden. 

Defend Matrix: D3-NTCD: Network Traffic Community Deviation
ASVS: 1.8.1 : Verify that all sensitive data is identified and classified into protection levels.

D: 4 / R: 4 / E: 2 / A: 4 / Neuer DREA: 14

threats.title: SQL injection
threats.description:
Attacker manipulates Data in Database through SQL injection
Capec 66
Attack: T1565 
DREA:10
threats.mitigation:
Input validation, check users input -> prepared statements
ASVS 1.2.4 Verify that data selection or database queries 
Drea 3

threats.title: Attacker accesses logs on SIEM server before encryption
threats.description:
A malicious insider could gain access to SIEM server and get information on sensitive data
Mitre  T1005 
CAPEC‑640 Insider Threat
DREA:6,25
threats.mitigation:
only log necessary and restrict to only admins, Access Logging  & Alerting
MASVS-STORAGE-1 The app securely stores sensitive data.
DREA: 4
